    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(Room pRoom)
        Creates Stack and Hashmap, initialize aCurrentRoom

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentRoom

        public Room getCurrentRoom()
        Returns the current room.

      • changeRoom

        public java.lang.String changeRoom(Command pDir)
        Change the room of the player if there's an exit. The aCurrentRoom is stored in the Stack aBackRooms.

      • back

        public boolean back()
        If there's no previous room, it returns false. Else the player return to the previous room and returns true.

      • addItem

        public void addItem(java.lang.String pDesc,
                    Item pI)
        Associates a description to an item in the aItems'HashMap

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem(java.lang.String pDesc)
        Removes an item from his description

      • getItem

        public Item getItem(java.lang.String pDesc)
        Returns the item associated with his description
